LuaParam

Represents a parameter to a C-function passed to Lua

See Also

<LuaManager>

Types
DataType
Bool

Signals that the data is of boolean type

Int

Signals that the data is of integer type

Double

Signals that the data is of double type

String

Signals that the data is of string type

Variables
data
union Data {
bool b;
long long i;
double d;
const char* s;
Data() : b(false) {} Data(bool _b) : b(_b) {} Data(long long _i) : i(_i) {} Data(double _d) : d(_d) {} Data(const char* _s) : s(_s) {}
} data

A union to hold the parameter value.

Value Types

  • bool

  • long long

  • double

  • const char
